octeon_macros.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Host driver: Inline macros for memory allocation/free and dispatch list handling.

Definition in file octeon_macros.h.

Go to the source code of this file.

Function Documentation

static void* cavium_alloc_aligned_memory ( uint32_t  size,
uint32_t *  alloc_size,
unsigned long *  orig_ptr 
) [inline, static]

Allocates with page size granularity.

Parameters:
size - size of memory to allocate.
alloc_size - pointer to 32-bit location where actual allocated size is returned.
orig_ptr - If the ptr was moved to make the memory buffer 8-byte aligned, the start address of allocated memory is returned here.
Returns:
If allocation is successful, the start of the 8-byte aligned buffer is returned, else NULL.

static void cavium_free_recv_pkt_buffers ( octeon_recv_pkt_t *  recv_pkt  )  [inline, static]

Free the buffers from a recv_pkt structure.

The buffer type determines the function to call to free the buffers.

Parameters:
- pointer to a recv_pkt structure.

static octeon_recv_info_t* octeon_alloc_recv_info ( int  extra_bytes  )  [inline, static]

Allocate a recv_info structure.

The recv_pkt pointer in the recv_info structure is filled in before this call returns.

Parameters:
extra_bytes - extra bytes to be allocated at the end of the recv info structure.
Returns:
- pointer to a newly allocated recv_info structure.

static octeon_dispatch_fn_t octeon_get_dispatch ( octeon_device_t *  octeon_dev,
uint16_t  opcode 
) [inline, static]

Gets the dispatch function registered to receive packets with a given opcode.

Parameters:
octeon_dev - the octeon device pointer.
opcode - the opcode for which the dispatch function is to checked.
Returns:
Success: octeon_dispatch_fn_t (dispatch function pointer)

Failure: NULL

Looks up the dispatch list to get the dispatch function for a given opcode.

) [inline, static]
